column1: 11/06/2013 Approved",,,11-Jun-13,Approved  ,,,03-Mar-16,Under construction ,01-Dec-16,,,,24-Jul-17,"Three renewable energy co-operatives, High Winds Community Energy Society, together with Baywind Energy and Energy Prospects, and with the support of the ethical investment company Thrive Renewables, have acquired the Mean Moor wind farm in Cumbria.
